
h1. Forum Polls Moderator Actions






h1. Edit Polls

You can edit the current poll in a specific topic by following guides:

*Step 1\.* Click the !EditPollButton.png! button on the topic bar. The *Poll* form will appear:

 !PollForm.png! 

*Step 2.* Make any changes to the poll's information then click the *Submit poll* button to finish.






h1. Delete Polls

You also can remove a poll from one topic by following guides:

*Step 1\.* Go into the topic having a poll that you want to remove.

*Step 2.* Click the !RemovePollButton.png! button to remove the poll.

*Step 3.* Click the *OK* in the confirmation message to accept deleting or the *Cancel* button to quit.


h1. Close Polls

# poll can be manually closed by clicking the *Close* button or automatically closed when the closed day is over. There are two ways to close polls:


+Manual way:+

*Step 1\.* Go into the topic that has an open poll.

*Step 2.* Click the !ClosePollButton.png! button on the topic bar to close the poll of this topic. After closing, the result of this poll will be displayed and it can be voted.

+Automatic way:+

The poll of the topic will be closed after some days. The number of days that the poll will be closed belongs to the *Close poll after* value which is set in the *Poll* form when adding a poll in topic by the Administrators or Moderators.




h1. Reopen Polls

Following guides to reopen a closed poll. 

*Step 1\.* Go into the topic that has a closed poll.

*Step 2.* Click the !ReopenPollButton.png! button to open the poll of this topic. After opening, all users can vote normally again.
